name: HackerUpdate
0:
”Alexa, ask hacker update to tell me the top stories”
”Alexa, ask hacker update to say the top articles”
”Alexa, ask hacker update to give me top stories”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hacker update
des:
The purpose of this skill is to get the top articles on Hacker News from https://news.ycombinator.com/news. To start, enable the skill. Once linked you may now go ahead and use it with starting with "Alexa, launch hacker update.". You can hear the top 5 articles' title and description from Hacker News' main page.

This skill is not sponsored or endorsed by Y Combinator. 
This skill is not sponsored or endorsed by Amazon.

Any questions or feedback about the skill email me: antonio.cucciniello16@gmail.com

Check out the code for the skill here: https://github.com/acucciniello/hacker-news-skill
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
